Instruction: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). Lightly grease two baking sheets.

Combine whole wheat flour, bread flour, rolled oats, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl.

Mix in buttermilk gently until a soft dough forms. Knead lightly.

Separate dough into 4 pieces and shape them into rounded flat loaves. Score each loaf with an "X" and place on the greased baking sheets.
Bake in the preheated oven until the loaves are golden brown and produce a hollow sound when tapped on the bottom, about 30 to 45 minutes.
